description: Wire up the non-functional Filter button in the Audit Logs page to show a filter popover allowing filtering by action type, resource type, actor, and date range. The backend already supports these filters via query params; only frontend UI and state management are needed.

phases.name: UI Foundation Components
phases.description: Create the base UI components needed for the filter functionality

subtasks.title: Add Radix Popover dependency
subtasks.description: Install @radix-ui/react-popover package to the frontend project
subtasks.notes: Successfully added @radix-ui/react-popover v1.1.4 to frontend/package.json dependencies

subtasks.title: Create Popover UI component
subtasks.description: Create a reusable Popover component using Radix UI, following the existing shadcn/ui patterns in the codebase
subtasks.notes: Successfully created popover.tsx following existing shadcn/ui patterns. Component includes Popover, PopoverTrigger, PopoverAnchor, and PopoverContent with proper styling and animations matching dialog.tsx and select.tsx patterns.

phases.name: Filter Popover Component
phases.description: Create the audit log filter popover component with all filter options

subtasks.title: Create AuditLogFilters component
subtasks.description: Build a reusable filter popover component containing: action type select, resource type select, actor input field, start/end date pickers, and apply/clear buttons
subtasks.notes: Successfully created AuditLogFilters component with action type select, resource type select, actor input field, start/end date pickers, and apply/clear buttons. Component follows existing UI patterns and uses shadcn/ui components.

subtasks.title: Create filter state management hook
subtasks.description: Create a custom hook useAuditFilters to manage filter state with URL sync for shareable filtered views
subtasks.notes: Successfully created useAuditFilters hook with URL sync. Hook provides draftFilters/appliedFilters states, applyFilters/clearFilters/clearFilter methods, and activeFilterCount tracking. Committed as 7e9d635.

phases.name: Admin Audit Page Integration
phases.description: Integrate the filter popover into the admin audit logs page

subtasks.title: Wire up Filter button in admin audit page
subtasks.description: Connect the existing Filter button to open the AuditLogFilters popover and pass filters to useAuditLogs hook
subtasks.notes: Successfully wired up Filter button in admin audit page. Integrated Popover component with AuditLogFilters, connected useAuditFilters hook for state management, and passed appliedFilters to useAuditLogs API hook. Export functionality also updated to respect active filters.

subtasks.title: Add active filter indicators
subtasks.description: Show badges or visual indicators when filters are active, and add a way to clear individual or all filters
subtasks.notes: Successfully implemented active filter indicators. Added badge to Filter button showing active count, displayed filter badges with clear functionality, and added 'Clear all' button. Committed as c87908a.

phases.name: Org Audit Page Integration
phases.description: Update the org audit page to use the real API with filters

subtasks.title: Wire org audit page to API
subtasks.description: Replace mock data in org audit page with actual useAuditLogs API call
subtasks.notes: Successfully replaced mock data with useAuditLogs() API call. The org audit page now fetches real data from the backend, displays it with proper formatting, includes loading states, empty state handling, and functional export. Filter controls remain disabled for next subtask 4.2.

subtasks.title: Add filter functionality to org audit page
subtasks.description: Add filter UI to org audit page, reusing the AuditLogFilters component
subtasks.notes: Successfully integrated filter UI into org audit page. Moved AuditLogFilters component and useAuditFilters hook to shared locations (components/shared and hooks) for reuse between admin and org layouts. Org audit page now has full filter functionality with Popover UI, active filter indicators, and Export respecting filters. Committed as ff6593f.

subtasks.title: Test filter combinations and edge cases
subtasks.description: Verify all filter combinations work correctly: empty states, clearing filters, combining multiple filters
subtasks.notes: Test with no results, single filters, multiple filters combined

subtasks.title: Update export to respect filters
subtasks.description: Ensure the Export button respects active filters when exporting audit logs
subtasks.notes: getAuditExportUrl already accepts filters parameter; just need to pass current filters

critical_files.purpose: Main admin audit logs page with non-functional Filter button
Org audit logs page using mock data
API hooks - useAuditLogs already accepts filters
TypeScript types for AuditFilters and AuditAction
Backend API already supports all filter parameters

final_acceptance: Filter button opens popover with all filter options
Action type filter works (CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, READ, LOGIN, LOGOUT)
Resource type filter works (Org, User, Team, etc.)
Actor filter works with text input
Filters can be cleared individually and all at once
Empty state shows when no results match filters
URL updates with filter state for shareability
Org audit page uses real API instead of mock data
